column1: You have to admit you have a problem before anyone can help you.
Nonsense! You did drugs! I suppose you forgot all about your family.

Mr. Mackey, you're supposed to be an adult.  The problem with drugs is that people forget to stop doing them. There's a time and a place for everything, Mr. Mackey, and it's called college! Now, I want you to repeat after me: Drugs are bad.
Congratulations, Mr. Mackey. You are fully recovered.
Just one more thing.  Remember that you can stay sober.
